name: Randy's Repairs
description:
Note: works best in fullscreen.

Bring thing's back from the dead and give them a second life in this Wario Ware inspired mini game mashup.

Made in <48hours for the SkyBox Labs Gameplay Guild Game Jam 1
https://itch.io/jam/death-is-only-the-beginning

With the them "Death is Only the Beginning", I created a game where you work at Randy's Repair shop, giving objects a second life.

I would have liked to add more minigames, and audio, but I mostly used this jam as an excuse to play around with a weird art style. I down scaled and palette shifted a bunch of stock imagery from unsplash.com to create the art for this game.

Game Instructions
Shake
- grab the centered item and shake fast to uncover a prize

Pour
- click to feed coffee to the downed object to awaken it!
